aboutPage.description1: Hello World! I am Louis, a Full stack developer with a unique set of skills that will bring a fresh perspective to your team.
aboutPage.description2: My coding skills are rock solid, from front-end design to back-end development, I have a knack for creating user-friendly interfaces and writing efficient, bug-free code. I'm well-versed in a variety of programming languages, including TypeSricpt, JavaScript, Python, PHP, HTML/CSS and technology such as: MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS, Wordress Core etc.

services.description1: The most modern and high-quality design made at a professional level.
services.description2: High-quality development of sites at the professional level.
services.description3: Professional development of applications for iOS and Android.
services.description4: I optimize high‑quality websites in any category at a professional level.

testimonials.feedback1: Louis transformed my food brand's page into a functional online store. We are delighted with the result. He has great business vision and adapts perfectly to what an entrepreneur needs.
testimonials.feedback2: He exceeded our expectations. Louis demonstrates professionalism in the quality of his work and, above all, listens to the client. I recommend him for his patience and great human touch.
testimonials.feedback3: I had a clear idea, but without Louis, it wouldn't have materialized. He developed my web app with great technical mastery. He knows exactly how to ground even the most ambitious ideas.
testimonials.feedback4: Setting up dropshipping requires a lot of internal configuration, and he mastered it all. His consultancy was key to integrating providers and payments without errors. His technical ability to solve problems is truly exceptional.

resumePage.education1: Full Stack Development – React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB (frontend & backend integration)
resumePage.education2: Website creation and management with Content Management Systems (CMS), including building, customizing, and maintaining user‑friendly sites.
resumePage.education3: Networking configuration, routing & switching, security, and troubleshooting
resumePage.experience1: Delivering tailored web solutions across diverse projects, from design to deployment. Skilled in adapting to client needs, integrating modern frameworks, and ensuring scalable, maintainable results
resumePage.experience2: React developer crafting clean TypeScript code, with Axios for data and Gestalt + Figma for design.
resumePage.experience3: Web developer using Vue.js for dynamic interfaces, Tailwind CSS for styling, TypeScript for clean code, Axios for data fetching, and Git for version control.
